title: Profit-maximizing strategy for monopolist on graph

content.question: For the firm shown in the graph above, the short- run, profit-maximizing strategy would be to set output at

choices.label: Q1, price at P1, and suffer a loss
Q1, price at P3, and earn an economic profit
Q1, price at P3, and earn only a normal profit
Q2, price at P2, and earn an economic profit
Q2, price at P2, and earn only a normal profit

content.answer: Q1, price at P3, and earn an economic profit

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
